welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bischwiller, a charming city in France known for its beautiful architecture and rich history. We invite you to explore and savor all the unique experiences this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karlsruhe/Baden-Baden Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Black Forest Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Black Forest Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.
